item.description: A group member,Lynda suggested a great idea...a holiday trolley ride at the Ct trolley museum and then a bite to eat at the cracker barrel restaurant...its a 3 mile round trip on the trolley and if 10 or more go ,then tickets would be 9 dollars.the cracker barrel is located nearby the museum...145 prospect hill rd east windsor 860-623-8820 ..lets have some fun...thanks again..Lynda!!

group.name: Eat, Laugh, and Be Merry in West Hartford

item.name: holiday doubleheader trolley ride and cracker barrel restaurant dec 10 630pm
